title: Best of The Program | Guests: Bill O'Reilly & David Barton | 11/6/20
description:
One forecaster has called the presidency for Joe Biden, but overall, this election had very good outcomes for Republicans. Glenn argues it may be our turn to take the stand for freedom. Bill O’Reilly talks recounts, election fraud, and how we can instill confidence in the process again. WallBuilders president David Barton details how the House and Senate races are looking good for Republicans and what he thinks will happen if Biden wins.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
